s1.name: Test Suite Download
s1.p: You can get the Test Suite either as a package or through CVS.

s2.name: Package
s2.p: The Test Suite is available as a package (Gzipped Tar file).

s2.name: CVS Repository
s2.p: The Test Suite is also available through CVS. To setup the CVS software, see CVS website
To access the CVS repository in anonymous mode, simply use the following commands (if you are using a GUI CVS client, configure it appropriately):
s2.source: cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.objectweb.org:/cvs/JORAM login password: cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.objectweb.org:/cvs/JORAM co tests
s2.p: When prompted for a password, simply press the Enter key.
This will create a replica of the test suite source tree in your account on your machine, with all files needed by the module. You can then compile and play with it.
Please note that the test suite is in the same CVS repository than JORAM but in a different module, you can checkout the Test Suite without getting JORAM code.

The Test Suite CVS repository can only be accessed in read mode in the pserver mode. Therefore, the only possible CVS commands are checkout, update, status or diff. When running the cvs update command, make sure that you are in the correct directory.
